definition: relating to or originating in or characteristic of another place or part of the world
details:
adjective
- relating to or originating in or characteristic of another place or part of the world
= example: relating to or originating in or characteristic of another place or part of the world
= synonyms: strange
- of concern to or concerning the affairs of other nations (other than your own)
= example: of concern to or concerning the affairs of other nations (other than your own)
- not contained in or deriving from the essential nature of something
= synonyms: alien
- not belonging to that in which it is contained
= synonyms: extraneous
